    • Uses of DDFManager in io.basic.ddf

      Subclasses of DDFManager in io.basic.ddf 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicDDFManager
      An implementation of DDFManager with local memory and local storage
      Constructors in io.basic.ddf with parameters of type DDFManager 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicDDF(DDFManager manager)
      Signature without List, useful for creating a dummy DDF used by DDFManager
      BasicDDF(DDFManager manager, List<?> rows, Class<?> unitType, String namespace, String name, Schema schema) 
      BasicDDF(DDFManager manager, Object rows, Class<?>[] typeSpecs, String namespace, String name, Schema schema)
      This signature is needed to support newDDF(DDFManager, Object, Class[], String, String, Schema)

    • Uses of DDFManager in io.ddf

      Methods in io.ddf that return DDFManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static DDFManager DDFManager.get(String engineName)
      Returns a new instance of DDFManager for the given engine name
      DDFManager DDF.getManager()
      Returns the previously set manager, or sets it to a dummy manager if null.
      Methods in io.ddf with parameters of type DDFManager 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void DDF.initialize(DDFManager manager, Object data, Class<?>[] typeSpecs, String namespace, String name, Schema schema)
      Initialization to be done after constructor assignments, such as setting of the all-important DDFManager.
      DDF DDFManager.newDDF(DDFManager manager)
      Instantiates a new DDF of the type specified in ddf.ini as "DDF", using the constructor that requires only DDFManager as an argument.
      DDF DDFManager.newDDF(DDFManager manager, Object data, Class<?>[] typeSpecs, String namespace, String name, Schema schema)
      Instantiates a new DDF of the type specified in ddf.ini as "DDF".
      protected void DDF.setManager(DDFManager DDFManager) 
      Constructors in io.ddf with parameters of type DDFManager 
      Constructor and Description
      DDF(DDFManager manager)
      This is intended primarily to provide a dummy DDF only.
      DDF(DDFManager manager, DDFManager defaultManagerIfNull) 
      DDF(DDFManager manager, Object data, Class<?>[] typeSpecs, String namespace, String name, Schema schema)
